Wow!\. Are you sure you haven't had a Minimon battle

Once again,\. I'm not a Minimon...
I'm still not sure what all that was...
Oh well.\. I lost fair and square.\!
That was a really fun battle!\. Let's do it again sometime!
Well,\. it seems you are the superior Trainer!\. But I
bet I could still beat you if I tried.\. If you ever
want to battle again,\. I'll be right here!
That's right!\. Don't mess with the best!\.
All of \N[1]'s party members have fainted.

May I have just five more minutes of rest,
Urgh\..\..\..back on my feet again.\. That
Eunice chick better be ready for a rematch!
I'm sure we'll get her next time!

sleep.\. It can wait until tomorrow.

I have the red, yellow, and blue crystals here with me,
\N[1].\. If you find the place they are supposed to go,\.
return to me and I'll give them back to you.
But right now,\. I'd focus on your primary directive.\.
Saving this world from whatever is befalling it.\.
What item will you show Mr. P?
You show Mr. P the Map
A map?\. That could be useful.
This is the most useless map I have ever laid eyes on.
Hey!\. That's the map that my friend sold in her shop.\.
Judging my friend's handiwork, are you, Mr. P?\. Surely
it's not the best map of the world,\. but she did the
Wait a minute!\. That's Roobie's map, isn't it?\.
Yeah,\. it's not her best work...
There isn't a legend or key or anything that helps you
know what you're looking at on this accursed thing!
What should we do with it then?
Give it to somebody who might get at least SOME use out
of it.\. I saw some poor sap out on the road who was
wandering around looking uncertain about himself.\. Why
don't you give it to him?
You show Mr. P the Fly Swatter.
Hey!\. What do you think you're doing with that thing?\.
Whoa, whoa!\. Calm down, Mr. P.\. What?\. Do you think
we wanted to swat you or something?
I-\.no.\. No.\. I'm sorry.\! So you have a fly swatter?\.
A tool whose specific purpose is to swat flies and other
Is there anyone you know who could use this in their home?\.
I do know that most insects prefer warm climates.\.
Perhaps you could go to some place hot and swat a little
I'm not sure how that's supposed to help our case at all,\.
You show Mr. P the Eye Drops.
Eye drops?\. Let me take a look at those.
The shipping address is put out to the Ocean Palace.\.
Ah,\. of course.\. Why didn't we think of checking the
I guarantee you that you'll find someone there who is
You show Mr. P the Inflatable Life Boat.
An inflatable life boat?\. It looks to be made of high
quality materials.\. Do you have any interest in boating,
Not unless boating can help us save the world!
Perhaps someone else would benefit more from this then.\.
I'd suggest combing a beach for anyone who needs a quick
You show Mr. P the Pickaxe.
What is a pickaxe used for?
Oh!\. Oh!\. Wait!\. I can answer this one!\.
And where does mining commonly take place?
You show Mr. P the Fork.
A fork?\. You've got to be kidding me.
Our thoughts exactly when our party first came in
This is a common dining utensil that will be of no use
to any of us.\. Though something uncommon about this
particular fork is that it has three prongs instead of
Come to think of it,\. I may have overheard someone in
this town complaining about how they lost a three
pronged object.\. Perhaps you should try finding them and
offer them this fork.\. Stranger things have happened...
You show Mr. P the Bone.
A bone?\. Was there a murder?\. Let me analyze this.\.
It looks like a bone from a very strange creature.\.
It reeks of seawater, meaning the victim must have been
Wait a minute\..\..\..this is rawhide.\. A dog's chew toy.
Sorry for getting your hopes up.
Want my advice?\. Make some lucky dog happy today.\. Give
You show Mr. P the Misplaced Sword.
Another sword?\. That particular sword looks like one of
the weapons that the Royal Guards of Halcyon use.
do we know any Royal Guardsmen who might have misplaced
their sword?\. Well,\. do we know any Royal Guardsmen
You show Mr. P the 10 Red Traffic Cones.
What are these and why are there ten of them?
Red traffic cones!\. And there's ten because that's a
Okay\..\..\..well,\. when life gives you ten red traffic
You make a red traffic cone smoothie?
No.\! You find someone who needs ten red traffic cones.\.
While I was flying around, I noticed a women standing
next to a fountain who was looking rather distressed.\.
Yes.\. This black silhouette you see conceals wings.
You show Mr. P the Chocolate Bar.
A chocolate bar?\. Do you really need my help on what to
do with a bar of chocolate?
Yes.\. Apparently,\. we are thoroughly perplexed as to what
Well,\. as long as chocolate isn't toxic to any of your
species,\. I suggest you unwrap it,\. share it around,\. and
Wait a minute,\. is chocolate toxic to kangaroos?\.
Even so,\. a little chocolate never hurt anybody~.
Heck,\. I could have told you that!\. When do you wanna
You show Mr. P the Tournament Pass.
What is this?\. "Dear lucky customer, you've just won
an opportunity to participate in the ALL-OUT BRAWL
TOURNAMENT OF TECHNOLOGICA.\. Present this pass to Mel
What do you make of this one, Mr. P.\. This one's got us
\..\..\..in my expert opinion,\. I would consider entering
the tournament.\. And further considering that you are the
Legendary Hero,\. I would consider winning the tournament.\.
That is,\. if you four consider yourself good fighters.
I don't really like to consider myself a fighter at all,\.
but I guess fighting is what I'm doing most on this
At the very least,\. it will be good experience for us.
You kidding?\. We're probably the best bunch of
You show Mr. P the Book.
A book?\. Entitled "The Amazing Imagination Machine."\.
A work of fiction no doubt.\. And you say someone you
faced in the Tournament dropped this?\. That already
shortens your list of possible suspects.
Let's see,\. we faced that trio of fish, \N[9]'s
adventuring team,\. and then Hygluk and Squidusa.\.
Who do you suppose dropped this book, \N[1]?
You show Mr. P the Broom.
This is a broom.\. What are you trying to say?\. That I
should think about tidying up my area of study?
Hey!\. It wouldn't hurt to spruce up this musty old shack
Be that as it may,\. I don't plan on staying here for
long.\! You know, frog,\. someone else who visited me
said something very similar to what you said.\. They
didn't seem too afraid of me either...
I forget her name,\. but she did show an interest in
items such as that broom.\. I'd pass this broom off to
her if you happen to find her whereabouts.\.
You show Mr. P the Industrial Strength Insecticide.
All right.\. I see how it is.\. Trying to kill me off
are you?\. Why don't we settle this man-to-man, instead!\.
Mr. P, please!\. We only wish for your advice on what
we should do with this poison.\. We would never dream
Seriously though,\. what's with the freakout, Mr. P?\.
You're acting like you're a giant insect or something...
Insect?\. No,\. don't be absurd!\. I'm not a giant insect!\.
This looks strong enough to take care of an entire
MOUNTAIN of no-good pesky varmints.\. If you know
anyone with a colossal infestation,\. give this to them.
Now please,\. take it back.\. I don't want to be holding
You show Mr. P the Dog Treat.
This is a dog treat.\. Why don't you give it to your dog?
This joke is getting old.\. I'm not a dog!
Oh for the love of\..\..\..I am NOT a dog.
For the last time,\. I'M NOT A DOG!!!
I wasn't referring to you, madam.
You show Mr. P the Actual Bone.
A bone?\. Was there a murder?\. Let me analyze it.
What does your analysis reveal,\. detective?
Interesting.\. This is the cleanest bone I have ever
seen.\. Normally bones have residue or stains left
on them after aging for so long,\. but this bone is
It's as if the creature this bone belonged to never
had skin or muscles or organs at all\..\..\..just a walking
You show Mr. P the Oddly-shaped Stone.
What an oddly-shaped stone.\. And yet something about the
shape of it seems familiar to me...
I could swear I've seen this shape before,\. but I
don't recall where.\. All I remember is that I saw it
The sky?\. What were you doing up there?
You show Mr. P the Mysterious Red Crystal.
That object you have there!\. I\..\..\..don't know how to
explain it,\. but I feel an energy emanating from that
crystal that is similar to the energy I felt when I went
through that wormhole!\. It must be related to our case!
I should like to perform some analysis on it.\.
I won't let anything happen to it while it is in my
You hand over the Mysterious Red Crystal.
It will be safe with me.
I don't get it, though.\. How's that thing supposed to
I'm not sure.\. But at this point,\. I'm willing to try
anything.\. I'll conduct an analysis on this crystal and
attempt to figure out its purpose.
Until then, Legendary Hero,\. if you happen to find any
more of these crystals,\. please let me know.
That crystal could help me return home!\.
Don't make me grovel on my hands and knees for it...
Excellent!\. May I please have it?
Thank you!\. I'll start analyzing it along with the
So this is the second strange crystal that we have
found.\. Do you suspect that there might be more?
Hm\..\..\..considering that the two crystals that we
currently have are primary colors,\. I'd wager that
there would be one for each primary color:\. red, yellow,
and blue.\. A set of three mysterious crystals...
\N[1],\. if you happen to find one more
crystal on your adventure,\. I would be
grateful if you showed it to me.
That crystal could help me return home!\.
Don't make me grovel on my hands and knees for it...
\N[1]!\. That very well may be the last
crystal?\. Could I take it from you?
Thank you!\. I'll place it with the other two.
Wonderful!\. I do believe our mysterious crystal
Have you found any indication of what they might be
No.\. In truth,\. I assumed that once we collected all
of the crystals,\. something would happen.\. I have
determined that each of these crystals contain a huge
amount of otherworldy energy,\. that when released...
It's not like a bomb,\. is it?\. Because I'll be very
disappointed if we collected those three things just
No.\. I have a theory that this energy could be used
to do many things,\. good or bad.\! And if one of those
things is creating interdimensional portals,\. which
would require a huge amount of energy,\. I'm all for it.
The only question is,\. how to release the energy from
these crystals.\. I won't try breaking them open,\.
because then they might just blow us to smithereens.\!
Perhaps they're waiting for some sort of catalyst?
Legendary Hero,\. I suspect that these three crystals
belong somewhere.\. Where that is,\. I don't know.\.
But if you happen to find a place where they might belong,\.
come back here and I'll give you the crystals.
But right now,\. I feel an awful chill running down my spine.\.
Something terrible is coming.\. I can feel it.\!
Perhaps it's time you fulfill your quest to save the world
and put a stop to The Benefactor, yes?
Oh!\. That's right!\. We've been so busy helping out
with everybody else's problems that I forgot that we
still have a world to save!
\N[1],\. I feel that we are ready to
face The Benefactor.\. We have restored your sword to its
full potential and gained so much experience on our
travels;\. The Benefactor is all that's left.
Well then,\. I guess we should get back to the castle and
have that meeting with him.\. Preferrably before whatever
terrible thing is coming comes.\. What say you guys?\.
Shall we be off then?\. Best not keep him waiting for
WOOOOOOOOOO!\. World saving time!\. Let's go team!

Hello?\. Oh,\. it's only you, \N[1].\. How are you?
You bought that shovel from me a while ago.\. Have you
dug up anything nice with it?\! I always see these
x-shaped marks in the ground where items have been
buried for some reason or another.\.
There's usually a handy item buried in those spots.\.
But did you know that sometimes there won't be any mark
on the ground to show you where you ought to dig?\. It
might not hurt to use the shovel in some suspicious places.
There's some food for thought for you.
Did you know that I have a shovel on sale at the shop?\.
It's only 500\G for you,\. and I promise you'll get
so much value out of it if you use it purposefully.
Are you catching any fish with your fishing rod?\.
I've got my own fishing rod and have caught quite a
few different fish casting off the little dock in the
You can catch different kinds of fish depending on your
location too!\. Saltwater fish from the ocean and
freshwater fish from rivers and lakes, for example.\.
Fishing is a very relaxing sport, wouldn't you agree?
Don't forget to stock up on bait.\.
Did you know that I have a fishing rod on sale at the shop?\.
Fishing is a wonderful recreational activity.\. At least
for us.\. Not so much for the fish.\! Do you think being
able to fish would help you on your adventure at all?
You know,\. I recently acquired a lantern that I've
since put up for sale at the shop.\. It's the perfect
tool for lighting up dark areas.\.
What's that?\. You say you could have used something like
that a while ago?\. Well it's available for you now if
you ever want to buy it.
\N[3]?\. Is that you?\. It's so good to hear from you!\.
It's been going great, Roobie!\. It's unlike
anything I ever expected,\. which just makes
the whole adventure even more thrilling!
That's wonderful to hear!\. I can't imagine being out
there myself.\. After all, who would run the shop?
I've been having such a swell time.\.
Everywhere we go is a grand, new experience.\.
I can hardly believe I've never decided to
That's wonderful to hear!\. I can't imagine being out
there myself.\. After all, who would run the shop?
You kidding?\. It's awesome!\. I've rode on
a ship across the ocean, been thrown in a
dungeon, gained an evil twin, and battled so
many monsters that I've lost count!
That's\..\..\..wonderful?\! I can't imagine being out
